original_title: Megg - A Margem Que Migra Para o Centro
overview: Megg Rayara overcame obstacles that should not exist to get where she is. Get a Doctorate Degree is a very important victory not only for her, but also for the transvestite community. For the first time in Brazil, a black transvestite wins a Doctorate Degree. It is the margin that migrates to the center, taking all its history with her.
title: Megg - The Margin Who Migrate to the Center
